## docker.RegistryDockerImageProps.newTag property

Tag to use for the image in the registry.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
newTag?: string;
```

## Remarks

If omitted, the tag from the source is used. The tag should not include the registry hostname/port prefix.
